titleStmt.title: Tvvo soveraigne salves for the soules sicknesse deliuered in certaine sermons at Hurst-church in the county of Berkes, neere Reading. By Robert Lovell, then minister and preacher of Gods word in the same parish.
titleStmt.author: Lovell, Robert, curate of Allhallows, Barking.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Nathanael Newbery, and are to be sould at the signe of the starre vnder St. Peters Church in Cornehill, and in Popes-head Ally,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
